definition: to investigate a crime on the spot/to occur (of a crime)/to be discovered (of a crime)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Armed robbery and abduction have been on the increase countrywide.
sentences.chinese: 持械抢劫和诱拐案的案发率在全国范围内都有所上升。

sentences.english: Locations are never hit more than once, but there is similarity in each.
sentences.chinese: 案发地点没有重复，但是每个都有相似之处。
案发地点就在她家的地下室里。

sentences.english: Policeman:Please tell me when and where it happened.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我案发的时间和地点。

sentences.english: The scene of crime had been protected.
sentences.chinese: 他有案发时不在现场的充分证据。

sentences.english: Please tell me when and where it happened.
sentences.chinese: 请告诉我案发的时间和地点。

sentences.english: He began to investigate other groups who might have been in the area.
sentences.chinese: 马里奥特着手调查可能出现在案发地的其他人群。

sentences.english: It's very suspicious that she was in the house when the crime happened.
sentences.chinese: 案发时她在房子里，此点非常可疑。

sentences.english: Assassins seldom hang around after they finish an assignment.
sentences.chinese: 刺客完成任务后，几乎不会滞留在案发地。

sentences.english: She was seen to enter the building about the time the crime being committed.
sentences.chinese: 有人看见她约在案发时进入了该建筑物。

sentences.english: The suspect confessed that he once had appeared in the criminal site,based on which,the injury confirmed his guilt.
sentences.chinese: 嫌疑人承认曾在案发现场，这是陪审团确信他有罪。

sentences.english: I can witness that he wasn't at the scene of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 我可以证明他不在案发现场。

sentences.english: He cannot be charged with murder for the reason that he was not in town when the crime was committed.
sentences.chinese: 他不能为这次谋杀负责，因为案发时他不在城里。

sentences.english: The officers moved methodically toward the body, making sure they did not disturb the crime scene.
sentences.chinese: 警察们井然有序地走向尸体，确保案发现场不被破坏。

sentences.english: But others were there at the time.
Have you seen anyone dispose of articles from the scene?
sentences.chinese: 案发后是否看到有人处理现场损失物品？

definition: to obtain (information from an archive etc)
occurrence (refers to time and place esp. of a criminal act)/to take place/to occur/to advertise freelance work
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察
to commit a crime or offence
